name: Spectrum (itch) (hitcherland)
description:
This game was submitted to Pizza Jam (August 2019), where the theme was a selection of horse names. My horse was Spectrum, winner of the Irish 2,000 Guineas race.

This game has no strict goal, but features:

  • Random puzzle generation
  • Adaptive difficulty
  • Extreme difficulty for colour blind people (I am so sorry).

Interaction:

Single mouse click/tap - all interactions
